function.name: device_location
function.description: Get GPS coordinates and location information for the current device. Tries system GPS/WiFi first (most accurate), falls back to IP geolocation. Returns latitude, longitude, accuracy, city, region, country, timezone, ISP, and more.

operation.description: Operation to perform: get_location (returns GPS coordinates and detailed location info)

provider.description: IP geolocation provider for fallback (default: ipapi). Only used if system location unavailable.
